trans-unit.source:
Vertical Tabs
If you activate this option, then the tabs will be shown in a vertical direction.
(Default: Horizontal direction)

Collapsed tabs
If you activate this option, then the user will be able to close all the tabs without any stay opened
(Default: 1 Tab always opened)

Deep Linking
If you activate this option, then the tabs will generate a URL in order for the user to be able come back to a specific item by clicking on the link on his browser history.
